name: Peppermint Dessert
ingredients: 1 pkg double stuff oreos, crushed 1 cup chopped nuts
1 pt whipping cream 1 1/2 lg sticks peppermint candy, crushed in blender
steps: Crush oreos and press onto the bottom of a 9 x 13 pan. Whip whipping cream. Fold in marshmallows,
nuts, and peppermint candy. Freeze. (you can substitute vanilla ice cream for whipping cream.)
